SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Order Product Tax Line Item Fields

The Order Product Tax Line Item object represents the tax on an order product. In Order Management, you usually interact with order product tax summaries instead of order product taxes.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Order Product Tax Line Item object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Amount	The total amount of the order product tax line item.
Created By	The user who created the order product tax line item record.
Created Date	The date and time the order product tax line item record was created.
Description	The description of the order product tax line item.
Last Modified By	The user who last changed the order product tax line item record.
Last Modified Date	The date when the order product tax line item record was last changed.
Name	The name of the order product tax line item.
Order Product	The order product to which the order product tax line item applies.
Order Product Adjustment Line Item	The order product adjustment line item to which the order product tax line item applies.
Rate	The percentage value of the tax. This field is blank if the tax is a flat amount.
Related Order Product Tax Line Item	The original order product tax line item. Used for reference when a change order is created.
Tax Effective Date	The date used to calculate the effective tax rate.
Type	

Indicates whether the amount on the tax line is an estimate or the final calculated amount.

Possible values are:

Actual
Estimated
